continents.name: Eryndor
continents.geography: A vast continent dominated by lush forests and towering mountains.
continents.culture: Known for its druids and harmony with nature.
continents.economy: Relies on sustainable forestry and rare magical herbs.
continents.conflicts: Struggles between druids and industrial factions seeking to exploit resources.

events.title: The Great Druidic War
events.description: A conflict between industrial factions and druids over the exploitation of magical forests.

iconic_figures.name: Elyndra the Forest Keeper
iconic_figures.description: A legendary druid who protected Eryndor's forests from industrial exploitation.

continents.relations: Eryndor trades magical herbs with Zarathia and Thalassia, but has tensions with Drakoria over resource exploitation.

continents.name: Zarathia
continents.geography: A desert continent with sprawling dunes and ancient ruins.
continents.culture: Rich in traditions of nomadic tribes and ancient sorcery.
continents.economy: Thrives on trade routes and rare artifacts unearthed from ruins.
continents.conflicts: Tensions between nomads and treasure hunters invading sacred sites.

events.title: The Nomadic Rebellion
events.description: Nomadic tribes united to repel treasure hunters invading sacred ruins.

iconic_figures.name: Khalid the Sand Sorcerer
iconic_figures.description: A powerful mage who safeguarded Zarathia's ancient ruins.

continents.relations: Zarathia maintains trade routes with Thalassia and Frostheim, but has conflicts with Sylvaris over magical artifacts.

continents.name: Thalassia
continents.geography: An archipelago with crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life.
continents.culture: Seafaring people with deep connections to oceanic deities.
continents.economy: Dependent on fishing, pearl diving, and maritime trade.
continents.conflicts: Piracy and territorial disputes over lucrative sea routes.

events.title: The Pirate Wars
events.description: A series of battles between Thalassian fleets and pirate factions.

iconic_figures.name: Captain Aria Wavecaller
iconic_figures.description: A legendary seafarer who defeated the infamous pirate lord.

continents.relations: Thalassia trades pearls and fish with Frostheim and Eryndor, but faces piracy from Umbrathal.

continents.name: Drakoria
continents.geography: A volcanic continent with fiery landscapes and dragon nests.
continents.culture: Home to dragon tamers and fire mages.
continents.economy: Exports rare minerals and dragon-related goods.
continents.conflicts: Battles between rival dragon clans and fire mage factions.

events.title: The Dragon Clan Wars
events.description: A conflict between rival dragon clans over territory and resources.

iconic_figures.name: Ignis the Flame Tamer
iconic_figures.description: A renowned dragon tamer who united warring clans.

continents.relations: Drakoria exports rare minerals to Sylvaris and Frostheim, but has territorial disputes with Eryndor.

continents.name: Frostheim
continents.geography: A frozen tundra with icy peaks and hidden caverns.
continents.culture: Populated by resilient tribes and frost magic practitioners.
continents.economy: Relies on ice mining and enchanted artifacts from the caverns.
continents.conflicts: Clashes between tribes over scarce resources and ancient relics.

events.title: The Ice Tribes' Alliance
events.description: A historic unification of Frostheim's tribes to defend against external threats.

iconic_figures.name: Bjorn the Frost King
iconic_figures.description: A legendary leader who united Frostheim's tribes.

continents.relations: Frostheim trades enchanted artifacts with Zarathia and Thalassia, but has tensions with Umbrathal over shadow incursions.

continents.name: Sylvaris
continents.geography: A mystical continent with floating islands and enchanted forests.
continents.culture: Known for its elven kingdoms and arcane scholars.
continents.economy: Focuses on magical research and trade of enchanted items.
continents.conflicts: Political intrigue among elven houses and arcane rivalries.

events.title: The Arcane Schism
events.description: A conflict between rival elven houses over control of magical research.

iconic_figures.name: Lirien the Star Scholar
iconic_figures.description: An elven mage who advanced Sylvaris' magical knowledge.

continents.relations: Sylvaris trades enchanted items with Drakoria and Frostheim, but has political intrigue with Zarathia.

continents.name: Umbrathal
continents.geography: A shadowy continent shrouded in perpetual twilight.
continents.culture: Inhabited by shadow mages and creatures of the night.
continents.economy: Specializes in rare shadow-infused materials and dark magic.
continents.conflicts: Power struggles between shadow mage guilds and nocturnal creatures.

events.title: The Shadow Guild Wars
events.description: A series of power struggles between shadow mage guilds.

iconic_figures.name: Nyx the Twilight Weaver
iconic_figures.description: A shadow mage who brought peace to Umbrathal's guilds.

continents.relations: Umbrathal trades shadow-infused materials with Sylvaris and Zarathia, but faces piracy from Thalassia.
